title: Play Definitely Not Dominion with Rioters!  Friday 2016/05/27 @ 4PM PDT (11PM UTC)
body:
L4T3NCY is AFK, so I'M IN CHARGE NOW BWAHAHA

Come play Definitely Not Dominion with some of the folks who helped make it!  We'll be playing a couple of games this afternoon and you should too.

**Who**: You!  Also, some folks who work at Riot Games.
**When**: Friday 2016/05/27 at 4PM PDT (11PM UTC)
**Where**: NA server

**Rioters**:
BuffMePlz
Riot Bearricade
Riot Defaultchar
Riot Terra
RiotVitzkrieg
SarumanTheBronze

Custom game details will be added here once we're good to go.

Game Name: DNDwRiot *full!*
Password: fastandfun?

Game Name: DNDwRiot2 *full!*
Password: fastandfun?

And that's that!  Thanks for playing all!

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/wide_medium/public/upload/rgm-banner_1920x1080.jpg

replies.body:
Unfortunately, I am going to see X-men. So I'll have to miss this one.

Have fun, Rioters and the people that play with them!

Psh...
I wanna 1v1 you with your choice champ...tell me who it is so I can poke and prod your soul...
Hmm, sounds fun... I wonder who I will play... Definitely not Bard...

Then I found out I am going somewhere *cries intensely*
I my team wins Rito buffs Aatrox{{champion:266}} {{item:3070}}

When are we going to get the OFA every mode, so me and Riot Terra can play the champ we both love? <3

{{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}}

I'll stick to farming mastery points with random people for my yordles. If I get dragged into EUW games with Rioters, I'd probably get my ass kicked and look like a failure to the audience.

TL;DR: I'll pass...
